item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump to halt enforcement of law banning bribery of foreign officials
2. Elon Musk-led consortium offers $100bn to take control of OpenAI
3. Russia’s fears over ex-Soviet nations laid bare in leaked paper
4. The man on a ‘divine mission’ to traumatise US bureaucrats
5. Billionaire’s daughter can hand back £33mn moth-infested mansion, court rules
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
